articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Remarks Dismissed
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia disparates provocativos de Lee Myung Bak
  Pyongyang, 15 de julio (ATCC) -- En entrevista concedida este miercoles con la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea en relacion con que el traidor Lee Myung Bak pronuncio durante su reciente gira por los paises europeos unos improperios sumamente provocativos acusando siniestramente el sistema y el problema nuclear de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) dio la siguiente respuesta:
					  Los chismes, que pronuncio Lee Myung Bak durante su visita a los paises europeos fomentando la confrontacion fratricida, no pasan de ser una artimana ridicula para involucrar esos paises en la campana nuclear y la "sancion" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, eludir la responsabilidad por el fracaso de su "politica sobre ella" y salir de la crisis en que ha caido en el ambito nacional e internacional, senalo el portavoz y prosiguio:
					
					  Supimos bien una vez mas a traves de las repetidas peroratas de Lee que la imprudente politica conflictiva y la campana nuclear anti-RPDC de las actuales autoridades surcoreanas no parten solamente de la "instigacion" de su amo norteamericano y del "consejo" de sus ayudantes inmediatos sino tambien de la malvada intencion y atributo ingenito de si mismo.
					
					Es imposible que el traidor Lee, quien aprendio solo las cosas de obras publicas y negocios, sepa la politica ni la esencia de las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					El traidor de Lee nunca podra entender con su cerebro infectado completamente del servilismo a EE.UU. la politica de independencia, la de Songun (priorizacion militar), considerada por nuestro pueblo coreano como su vida.
					
					En vez de calumniar en el extranjero a la connacional RPDC, el traidor Lee debe atender primero su miserable situacion.
					
					Pues, el es denunciado y repudiado por los habitantes surcoreanos y otros compatriotas debido a su repugnante dictadura fascista y campana de confrontacion fratricida.

articles.title: Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Art Troupe Performs in Beijing
articles.content:
Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Art Troupe Performs in Beijing
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The visiting Pyongyang schoolchildren's art troupe gave its premiere at the Music Theater of the State Grand Theater in Beijing on July 13 on the occasion of the "year of the DPRK-China friendship".
					 Among the audience were Chen Haosu, president of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries, Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association, Chen Zuming, secretary general of the China Association for International Friendly Contact, and others and officials concerned, citizens in Beijing and school youth and children. 
					
					 Choe Jin Su, DPRK ambassador to China, and his embassy officials appreciated the performance. 
					
					 The performance began with chorus "Song of General Kim Il Sung", immortal revolutionary hymn. 
					
					The troupe's repertoire included female solo "My Country is Kim Jong Il's Country", song and dance "Pyongyang Is Best" and others making a truthful representation of the happy schoolchildren of the DPRK bringing their hopes and talents into full bloom under the care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also staged solo dance "Dance of Bamboo Hat" and "Dance of Water Jar" and duet dance "Fishing" and other dances reflecting the minds of Korean schoolchildren.
					
					 It successfully presented Chinese songs "I Like My Mother Best in the World" and "Song of Toast" to the delight of the audience. 
					
					 The president of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries said that the performance given by the Pyongyang schoolchildren's art troupe represents a gift presented to the "year of China-DPRK friendship", expressing belief that it would contribute to the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship.

articles.title: New Documentary Film Produced
articles.content:
New Documentary Film Produced
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- "I Will Add Glory to Korea," Part 1 of  documentary film "The Sun of Songun Shedding Its Rays All over the World" has been produced by the Korean Documentary and Science Film Studio.
					The multi-part documentary film will comprehensively deal with the immortal Songun revolutionary exploits performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il for the country and the revolution, the times and humankind with his extraordinary wisdom and distinguished leadership art, political caliber and noble personality.
					
					 The part 1 of the film tells about the historical facts that Kim Jong Il, born as a son of the legendary guerrillas in Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of revolution, on February 16, Juche 31 (1942), grew to be a great successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche amid the tempest of revolution and made a firm determination to make the country shed its rays all over the world with arms.
					
					 It contains impressive scenes telling that Kim Jong Il established a Juche-based outlook on army on the basis of his experience gained in the grim periods of the great anti-Japanese war, the building of a new country, the Fatherland Liberation War and the postwar rehabilitation and construction and acquired the perfect personality and qualification to be possessed by a leader.
					
					 The film tells about the undying feats Kim Jong Il performed by firmly preparing students in military aspects and synthesizing and systematizing the original military ideas and theories and tactics of President Kim Il Sung and thus consolidated the ideological and theoretical foundation of Songun leadership, while conducting his revolutionary activities at Kim Il Sung University.
					
					 It emphasizes that the solemn oath taken by Kim Jong Il in those days of history will go down forever with the glorious history of Korea, the revolutionary history of Songun.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- New stamps (a kind of sheetlet and an individual stamp) reflecting monumental edifices of the Songun era have been brought out in the DPRK.
					 Printed in the sheetlet are stamps showing the newly built E-library of Kim Chaek University of Technology and the reconstructed Taedongmun Cinema, Okryu Restaurant and Chongryu Restaurant with the Tower of Juche Idea and the bank of the Taedong River as the background.
					
					 The individual stamp describes the Pyongyang Grand Theatre, a cultural centre, showcasing the excellent architecture of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Positive Measures Taken against Possible Flood Damage
articles.content:
Positive Measures Taken against Possible Flood Damage
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The rainy season has set in the DPRK.
					 Anti-flood measures are being taken throughout the country to cope with the rainy seasons every year.
					
					 The sector of the power industry has repaired and readjusted on a regular basis the hydraulic structures including the dams of the hydro-power stations and intakes on waterways so as to produce electricity without interruption in the rainy season.
					
					 The sector of the mining industry is checking, repairing and reinforcing all the drainage facilities of the pits to prevent them from being inundated and the excavated coal and ore from being washed away.
					
					 Thorough measures are being taken in the field of railway transportation to protect railway facilities and structures including railroads, railway bridges and retaining walls in the northern inland and east coastal areas from torrential rain.
					
					 The people in the agricultural sector have repaired and adjusted in time the drainage pumping stations and drainage facilities so as to keep them in full operation.
					
					 Meanwhile, co-op farms across the country are digging out deeper the waterways and ditches to protect the land under cultivation, crops and agricultural production facilities from any heavy rainfall.
					
					 The sectors of the land and environmental conservation and the city management are checking the rivers, waterways, reservoirs, sewerage networks and storm sewerage system to eliminate the imperfect points.They are now exerting effort to manage them in a regular way.
					
					 People in the barrage management field are fully ready to drain out in time any flood by regularly managing sluices and those in the hydrometeorological administration guarantee the swiftness and scientific accuracy of the data.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday dedicates a signed article to the 23rd anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Some Problems of Education in the Juche Idea".
					 The work comprehensively clarifies the profound principles of the Juche idea and the theoretical and practical issues which serve as guidelines for developing in depth the WPK's ideological education as required by the developing reality including the issue of conducting all forms of ideological education in combination with the basic principle of the Juche idea.
					
					 Strengthening the education in the Juche idea is an important requirement for consolidating the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks around the headquarters of the revolution, giving full play to the mental power of all the servicepersons and the people in building a great prosperous and powerful nation and helping the servicepersons and people of the DPRK acquire transparent anti-imperialist working class consciousness, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The ideological and moral pabulum of the people living in the present era is provided by the Juche idea and all the strategic guidelines and ways for building a thriving nation are also fully reflected in the Juche idea and the Songun idea. 
					
					The ideological education to firmly arm all the people with the Juche idea and the Songun idea and thoroughly embody the Juche idea in all fabrics of society has made dynamic progress, bringing about a dramatic turn in the ideological and moral traits of the servicepersons and the people and making the spirit of the great unity in the Songun era prevail throughout the country.
					
					 The Juche idea and the Songun idea of the WPK serve as precious ideological and moral pabulum for helping the Korean people grow strong in ideology and faith. 
					
					 The revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu mounting across the country and the Korean people's strong national self-respect and their ardent patriotic resolution to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation of Juche on this land by their own efforts and in Korean style are based on the Juche idea. 
					
					 The on-going drive to build a thriving nation amounts to confrontation with imperialism without gun report. 
					
					It is the unanimous will of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to counter the imperialists' counter-revolutionary offensive with a revolutionary offensive and react to the enemy's pressure and sanctions by intensifying the movement for effecting a great revolutionary surge and surely emerge victors in the on-going fierce anti-imperialist working class struggle.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work on Korea's Reunification Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work on Korea's Reunification Observed
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday dedicates an article to the 37th publication anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Struggle Resolutely to Implement the Three Principles of National Reunification".
					 The work, published on July 14, Juche 61 (1972), is a monumental document as it clarifies the most correct way for thoroughly embodying the three principles of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--advanced by President Kim Il Sung in the reunification movement as a whole, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Expounded in the work as a definite logic are such problems as easing the military tension and taking practical measures to remove the source of war in the country, achieving the great national unity through a transcendence of the differences in ideology, ideals and systems and struggling under the banner of independence to get the U.S. forces withdrawn from south Korea and frustrate the Japanese militarists' scheme of reinvading south Korea.
					
					 More than 30 years have passed since the publication of the work but the validity and vitality of the idea and theory laid down in it are being proved more strikingly as the days go by.
					
					 The three principles of national reunification are a charter for reunification common to the Korean nation that should be consistently held fast to until the reunification is achieved, no matter how the situation and circumstances may change.
					
					 The emotion-charged June 15 era of reunification is a precious fruition of the wise leadership provided by Kim Jong Il to implement the said three principles to the letter.
					
					 The Korean nation's reunification movement is now undergoing trials and difficulties. However, the three principles of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity remain as the everlasting fundamental cornerstone for national reunification, brightly showing the road ahead of the movement for national independent reunification.
					
					 The Korean nation is dynamically advancing full of confidence that it can achieve the independent reunification in the near future.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Stamp out Democracy Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Stamp out Democracy Flayed
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The Students Action Solidarity to Force Lee Myung Bak to Step down and Regain Democracy grouping 34 university student councils and 22 students organizations of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on July 10 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group for its moves to stamp out democracy.
					 The participants accused the authorities of taking such undemocratic tyrannical actions as conducting a rude investigation into university professors for the mere reason that they conducted education contrary to their taste and perpetrating an investigation into e-mail messages of media persons.
					
					 They expressed irrepressible resentment at the reality that media persons are handcuffed, indicted and subject to disciplinary actions for making just assertions. 
					
					 They called on the people to wage a stubborn struggle against the present authorities' moves to stamp out democracy and reckless suppression and force the Lee group to step down.

articles.title: Struggle to Judge Lee Myung Bak Called for
articles.content:
Struggle to Judge Lee Myung Bak Called for
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and public organizations including the All-People Committee for Measures against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan, figures of opposition parties, religionists and bereaved families of the slain evacuees of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on July 11 at which they called for judging traitor Lee Myung Bak without fail.
					 Speakers said at the meeting that it is half a year since the tragedy in Ryongsan, but the probe into the truth behind the tragedy has not yet been made and the prime mover of the murder is allowed to go scotfree.
					
					 The tragedy in Ryongsan brought into bolder relief the undemocratic, anti- human rights and unpopular nature of the present "government" and the "Grand National Party", they held, adding that Lee would be surely forced to kneel down before the people just as the past fascist dictators did.
					
					 No regime can prevail over the people, they declared, calling upon all the political parties and civic and public organizations to get solidarized and united and judge the incompetent, mean and arrogant Lee conservative ruling forces without fail.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Struggle Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Struggle Supported
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- A regional organization and Egyptian figures made public statements on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Baguma Isoke, director general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, in a statement on July 7 said that with neither blockade nor sanctions can the U.S.-led hostile forces shake the DPRK, expressing solidarity with the Korean people in their resolute struggle against them.
					
					 Noting that nuclear weapons can not be a monopoly of some powers, the statement demanded the UN Security Council retract its "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, in his statement on July 5 said that more than six decades have passed since the homogeneous Korean nation which has lived in one and the same territory for thousands of years was forced to live separated in the north and the south. It is the outside forces that are entirely to blame for the division of Korea and the hurdles lying in the way of reunification.
					
					 He denounced the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK adopted at the instigation of the U.S. imperialists and expressed support and solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle for achieving the reunification of the country.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain made public a joint statement on July 8 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement recalled that the demise of the President was the greatest misfortune and biggest loss in history as it brought pain to the Korean people and other revolutionary people of the world.
					
					 The President, born into a poor peasant's family, launched a struggle to save the destiny of the country and the nation from the colonial yoke of the Japanese imperialists by relying on the strength of the popular masses, the statement noted, adding that he fathered the immortal Juche idea and led two wars against the imperialists to victory.
					
					 He built the best socialist system centered on the popular masses in Korea and turned the DPRK into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, the statement pointed out, stressing that the DPRK is shedding its rays as a beacon of hope for the world progressives.
					
					 It highly praised Kim Il Sung as a prominent leader of the world revolution who put forward a correct strategy for the world revolution and national and class emancipation and a great teacher in the international working class movement.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung were held in Italy, Democratic Congo and Cambodia on July 2 and 3 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of his demise. 
					Displayed in the venues of the seminars were works of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photographs showing their immortal exploits and books and photographs introducing the Korean people in the struggle for building a great prosperous powerful nation and achieving the reunification of the country.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Unified Communist Party of Italy said that the world progressives are looking back with deep emotion upon the undying exploits performed by the President for humankind. He praised the immortal exploits the President performed by defending the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation after embarking upon the road of revolution in his early years and building a socialist power on this land, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence. 
					
					The chief of the Milano Branch of the Italian Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea said that the Korean people are now dynamically accelerating the building of a great prosperous powerful socialist nation, holding high the banner of Songun idea which was founded by the President and has been developed and enriched by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea of Democratic Congo praised the President as the leader of the people as he had always shared joys and sorrows with people, regarding it as his maxim to believe in people as in Heaven all his life, and as an invincible and iron-willed commander who defeated two formidable imperialist enemies in one generation and defended the independence and sovereignty of the country.

articles.title: Death Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Observed in Peru
articles.content:
Death Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Observed in Peru
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship issued bulletins between July 1 and 6 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The bulletins in an article titled "In 15 years after the demise of President Kim Il Sung" said that 15 years have passed since the demise of Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, but he seems to remain alive while leading the country and the people.
					
					The bulletins noted in detail that the glorious history of the cause of perpetuating the memory of the President was started in the DPRK with the noble sense of moral obligation of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the Korean people have been waging the dynamic drive to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation, true to what the President intended in his lifetime.
					
					 In articles under such titles as "Leader of people", "His whole life seen through numbers" they stressed that the President had devoted his all to the happiness of people during his lifetime and is enjoying boundless reverence from the progressive mankind for his immortal exploits.
					
					 They highly praised the foresightedness of the President who advanced unique lines ensuring the prosperity of Korea and the victory of the socialist cause and wisely led the army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Women Can Do Anything
articles.content:
Women Can Do Anything
 Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine, visited the house of an anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter in Ranam City (then) in September of Juche 36 (1947).
					 The fighter's wife, an official of the women's union, was deeply moved by the unexpected visit of the heroine.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk exchanged cordial greetings with her before asking her about the affairs of the union.
					
					 Though the social status of women was improved after the promulgation of the Law on Sex Equality, the women in the area did not get rid of survivals of feudal ideas by that time.
					
					 Having acquainted herself with the fact, Kim Jong Suk instructed the official that the women's union should inspire women to the building of a new society in every way and the women had nothing impossible when they were firmly determined to implement President Kim Il Sung's policy for building a state.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk asked her what she was doing in the women's union and added that the women should take an active part in the social life along with the family life and the women's union members assist army units in a positive way.
					
					 Noting that the women should do their bit in the construction of a new society, she said with emphasis that they should work with all devotion for building a state in perfect accord.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, with warm affection of teaching her mere daughter how to start to walk, taught the woman how to work. The instruction deeply excited her.

articles.title: Se dinamiza en Corea campana para prevenir danos por inundacion
articles.content:
Se dinamiza en Corea campana para prevenir danos por inundacion
Pyongyang, 15 de julio (ATCC) -- Comenzo en Corea la temporada de lluvias.
					  En este periodo de cada ano, se toman en el ambito nacional las medidas preventivas de los danos por la inundacion.
					
					  En la rama de industria electrica, se realizan periodicamente la reparacion y el mantenimiento de las estructuras hidraulicas como el dique y la cisterna intermedia de las centrales hidroelectricas para evitar la interrupcion de la produccion electrica en el tiempo de muchas precipitaciones.
					
					  En el dominio de industria extractiva, previenen el sumergimiento de las galerias mediante el chequeo, la reparacion y el refuerzo de todos los equipos de desague e impulsan minuciosamente las labores para prevenir las perdidas del carbon y minerales excavados.
					
					  En el sector de transporte ferroviario se toman estrictas medidas de seguridad para que no fueran perjudicados por el aguacero los ferrocarriles, los puentes de hierro, los muros de contencion y otros establecimientos y estructuras en la zona interior septentrional y la costera oriental del pais.
					
					  En el dominio agricola, se ponen en pleno funcionamiento las estaciones de bombeo y otras instalaciones de drenaje reparadas y chequeadas a tiempo. 
					
					  Por otra parte, las granjas de todo el pais excavan profundamente los canales y las acequias para proteger las tierras, las plantas agricolas y las instalaciones para la produccion agricola desde la repentina lluvia torrencial.
					
					  Tambien, en las ramas de proteccion territorial y ambiental y de urbanismo arreglan los puntos defectuosos en los rios, los riachuelos, los depositos de agua potable, el alcantarillado y la red de escape de precipitaciones.
					
					  En el dominio de administracion de esclusas, marcha bien el control de compuertas para mantenerse listo para el saque de aguas de exceso.
					
					  Mientras tanto, el dominio hidrometeorologico brinda rapida y exactamente las informaciones cientificas del tiempo.

articles.title: Filmado nuevo documental "Sol del Songun que brilla en todo el mundo"
articles.content:
Filmado nuevo documental "Sol del Songun que brilla en todo el mundo"
Pyongyang, 15 de julio (ATCC) -- Los Estudios de Filmes Documentales y Cientificos de Corea acabaron de filmar la primera parte "Hare grande a Corea" del nuevo documental "Sol del Songun que brilla en todo el mundo".
					Este largometraje en serie recogera en sus partes las imborrables hazanas revolucionarias que realizo el Dirigente Kim Jong Il mediante el Songun (priorizacion militar) ante la patria, la revolucion, la epoca y la humanidad dando pruebas de su excepcional prevision, extraordinaria arte de direccion, capacidad politica y nobles virtudes.
					
					En la primera parte se ven las escenas historicas mostrando que el Dirigente, nacido el 16 de febrero del 31 (1942) de la Era Juche en el monte Paektu, lugar sagrado de la revolucion, como hijo del legendario guerrillero, crecio como gran sucesor de la causa revolucionaria del Juche en medio de los vientos y mareas de la revolucion y tomo el juramento de glorificar a Corea a la vista del mundo con las fuerzas armadas.
					
					Muestran los hechos impresionantes de que el  trazo la autoctona concepcion de las fuerzas armadas y llego a tener perfectamente los rasgos y cualidades de dirigente experimentando los severos tiempos de la batalla antijaponesa, la construccion de la nueva patria, la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y la reconstruccion posbelica.
					
					Ademas, graba las proezas imborrables del Dirigente quien cuando libraba actividades revolucionarias en la Universidad Kim Il Sung, formo a los universitarios como listos en lo militar y sento la solida base ideo-teorica de la direccion del Songun al sistematizar generalmente la original idea, la teoria y metodos de combate militares del Presidente.
					
					Finalmente, la cinta destaca que el gran juramento tomado por el Dirigente en aquel dia historico sera vigente para siempre junto con la sagrada historia de Corea y la de la revolucion del Songun.

articles.title: Personalidades extranjeras apoyan lucha del pueblo coreano
articles.content:
Personalidades extranjeras apoyan lucha del pueblo coreano
Pyongyang, 15 de julio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del mes de lucha comun antiyanqui del 25 de junio al 27 de julio, las personalidades de organizacion regional y de entidad egipcia hicieron publicas sendas declaraciones. 
					El director general del Comite Regional Africano para el Estudio de la Idea Juche, Baguma Isoke, en su declaracion fechada 7, dijo que aunque las fuerzas hostiles encabezadas por Estados Unidos pretenden ejercer el bloqueo y las sanciones a Corea, esta no se vacilara nunca, y expreso su solidaridad con el pueblo coreano que lucha con tenacidad. 
					
					Las armas nucleares no son un objeto monopolizado por algunas potencias, enfatizo y exigio que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU renuncie la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC.
					
					En tanto, el presidente del Comite para el Estudio de la Idea Juche de Egipto, Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, en su nota fechada 5, senalo que ya pasaron mas de 60 anos desde cuando la nacion coreana homogenea con la historia de varios milenios vive dividida en el Norte y el Sur, y apunto que el autor de esta tragedia nacional y el estorbador de la reunificacion de Corea son precisamente las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Rechazo la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC aprobada por el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU bajo la instigacion de EE.UU., y expreso el apoyo y solidaridad con la lucha del pueblo coreano por la reunificacion del pais.
